FuncDef:
The protocol inbound command specifies the protocols that the current user interface supports.
The undo protocol inbound command restores the default protocols supported by the current user interface. The protocol inbound command specifies the protocols that the current user interface supports. The undo protocol inbound command restores the default protocols supported by the current user interface. By default, the user interface supports all protocol types, including SSH and Telnet.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies that the system supports all protocols: SSH, Telnet, and all.
-

Specifies that the system supports only SSH protocol.
-

Specifies that the system supports only Telnet protocol.
-

ExtraInfo: To manage users that log in to the user interface, specify the VTY user interface for users login and run the protocol inbound command to configure protocols supported by the VTY user interface.
